title: The Botanical Automaton's Morning Routine
prompt: (masterpiece), ultra detailed, cinematic lighting, 3D Anime style, a helpful futuristic anthropomorphic robot (white and cyan chassis, sleek design) gently watering a lush collection of houseplants in a modern, sunlit studio apartment greenhouse. The robot holds a metallic watering can. The room features large arched windows showcasing a distant city skyline at sunrise. Wooden shelves are filled with various vibrant plants, including pink and white orchids, Monstera, and hanging ivy. In the background, a large monitor displays holographic plant health data and vital signs. Soft volumetric sunlight streams through the windows, creating warm atmosphere and subtle shadows. Detailed environment, 16:9 aspect ratio.
